description: Numbers n such that n divides the (left) concatenation of all numbers <= n written in base 17 (most significant digit on right).
comments: This sequence differs from A061970 in that all least significant zeros are removed before concatenation.No more terms < 10^7. [Lars Blomberg, Sep 20 2011]
